00053   void testMenuItemName(){ 
00054     const char* name="MenuItemName";
00055     this->m_caption->setName(name);
00056     int ret=strcmp( this->m_caption->getName(), name);
00057     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( ret==0 );

00076     this->m_caption->setAction(&MenuItemTestAction);
